summary: In a big mansion, a scientist has been experimenting with humans and animals, mixing their DNA together.
cast: John Patrick Jordan|Jessica Lancaster|Peter Donald Badalamenti II|Lorielle New|Ling Aum|B.J. Smith|Debra Mayer|Jacob Witkin|Laura Petersen|Jack Kennedy|Steve Quimby|Tony Simmons|Katy Zimmon|Bob Uyeda|Erin Zimmon|Josh Deaver|Aaron Reigner|Kim Burrows|Martin Nguyen|Theresa Padilla|Tammy Padilla|Danny Hamamoto|Deanna Goose|Phillip Smithee
title: Dr. Moreau's House of Pain
